org.forgerock.openidm.config.enhanced

Class JSONEnhancedConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.config.enhanced.JSONEnhancedConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnhancedConfig

    public class JSONEnhancedConfig
extends Object
implements EnhancedConfig
    A utility to handle enhanced configuration, including nested lists and maps to represent JSON based structures.

      • setEscaping

        public JSONEnhancedConfig setEscaping(boolean escape)
        Sets the escaping mode.

        If true then this newBuilder processes the escapes \ character in the sting values otherwise it does not handle specially the \ character.

        Parameters:
        escape - true to enable or false to disable.
        Returns:
        this newBuilder.

      • getConfiguration

        public Map<String,Object> getConfiguration(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext compContext)
                                    throws InvalidException,
                                           InternalErrorException
        Specified by:
        getConfiguration in interface EnhancedConfig
        Parameters:
        compContext - The component context with the configuration to retrieve
        Returns:
        the enhanced configuration (with nested maps, list allowed), empty map if no configuration properties exist.
        Throws:
        InvalidException - if the configuration is invalid
        InternalErrorException - if a failure occurred in retrieving the configuration

      • getConfigurationAsJson

        public org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue getConfigurationAsJson(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext compContext)
                                                           throws InvalidException,
                                                                  InternalErrorException
        Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists
        Specified by:
        getConfigurationAsJson in interface EnhancedConfig
        Parameters:
        compContext - The component context with the configuration to retrieve
        Returns:
        the enhanced configuration with nested maps, list allowed
        Throws:
        InvalidException - if the configuration is invalid
        InternalErrorException - if a failure occurred in retrieving the configuration

      • getConfiguration

        public org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue getConfiguration(Dictionary<String,Object> dict,
                                                   org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                                                   String servicePid)
                                                     throws InvalidException,
                                                            InternalErrorException
        Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists
        Specified by:
        getConfiguration in interface EnhancedConfig
        Parameters:
        dict - The standard OSGi configuration properties dictionary
        context - The OSGi bundle context, used to detect other services such as for decryption
        servicePid - the service pid this configuration is for
        Returns:
        the enhanced configuration (with nested maps, list allowed), empty map if no configuration properties exist.
        Throws:
        InvalidException
        InternalErrorException

                                                            InternalErrorException
        *
        Parameters:
